title: Former Mayor of Istanbul Kadir Topbaş dies of COVID-19 aged 76 | Daily Sabah

quotes: Topbaş had announced his resignation after 13 years of service in September 2017.
He was replaced by Başakşehir district mayor Mevlüt Uysal of the AK Party, which conceded the next local elections in March 2019 to main opposition Republican People's Party's (CHP) Ekrem Imamoğlu.
